translated: Jātaka🔽The Group of Three Collections🔽The Chapter on the Well
The Birth Story of the King of Geese
with a fickle mind, a fool,🔽do you endure this suffering
of the one who gives all that is desired?
You should kill him with your horn
and trample him with your feet;
the fools would be even more angry,
but there is no one to restrain them.”
he will do the same to others;
and that will be my freedom.”
The eighth birth story, that of the King of Geese.
